thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother’s Jedward admit they have no idea how their dad is doing as he ‘fights for his life in hospital’
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother’s Jedward admit they have no idea how their dad is doing as he ‘fights for his life in hospital’

author: njomu
title: Celebrity Big Brother’s Jedward admit they have no idea how their dad is doing as he ‘fights for his life in hospital’
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JEDWARD have admitted they are still not sure how their father is doing after it was revealed he is ‘fighting for his life’. 
The pair only discovered the heartbreaking news their dad is in hospital after leaving the Celebrity Big Brother house because John Snr insisted the pair should not be told in order to allow them to continue the show. Getty Images - WireImage 8 Jedward have admitted they are still not sure how their father is doing after it was revealed he is ‘fighting for his life’ 
Speaking to The Sun online at a press conference, the twin popstars admitted: “We are going to talk to him now. We still don’t know the full story yet. We aren’t going to talk about him till we know.” 
The singers came second in the Channel 5 reality show but they were unaware their father was seriously ill after he decided not to tell them so they wouldn’t leave the show and disappoint their fans. 
The boys’ mum and manager Susanna Condron revealed the news to the Daily Star , telling them: “The last week has been very stressful for Jedward’s family. 
“John Snr has been in intensive care. He insisted Edward and John must not be informed about his critical condition. Collins The brothers’ dad is in hospital fighting for his life Fame Flynet The duo came second in the Celebrity Big Brother finale Fame Flynet 8 They put on a brave face to celebrate the end of the show with winner Coleen Nolan after discovering about their father 
“He stated he would not jeopardise their chances of reaching the final as there would have been legions of disappointed fans.” 
The brave decision meant that Jedward continued in the show and reached second place , being beaten by Loose Women star Coleen Nolan . 
The Irish brothers made a typically flamboyant departure from the famous house after host Emma Willis announced they had lost out to Coleen Nolan on winning the show. 
The pair have had an eventful week leading up to Friday’s big final, with the pair almost making fellow housemate Nicola McLean sick as they ate dog food for one of their last tasks. 
The Irish duo were taking part in the daily task, where they had to present a spoof television shopping channel called Selling Yourself Short. Coleen Nolan wins Celebrity Big Brother 2017 beating Jedward
